org.rythmengine.internal.dialect

Class BasicRythm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rythmengine.internal.dialect.DialectBase
      • org.rythmengine.internal.dialect.SimpleRythm
        • org.rythmengine.internal.dialect.BasicRythm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDialect

    public class BasicRythm
extends SimpleRythm
    Basic Rythm is a very limited subset of Rythm which has only basic Rythm features:
    • Expression evaluation (nullable express also supported) and escaping
    • if-elseif-else, and for(T e: Iterable)

    Specifically, argument declaration and scripting is disabled in ToString mode; @for(; ;) is not allowed in Basic mode to prevent infinite loop
